org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Interface IAeProcessManager

All Superinterfaces:
IAeManager
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAePersistentProcessManager, IAeRecoverableProcessManager, IAeRecoveryProcessManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractProcessManager, AeDelegatingPersistentProcessManager, AeDelegatingProcessManager, AeInMemoryProcessManager, AeMirroringProcessManager, AePersistentProcessManager, AeRecoveryProcessManager, AeRepeatingProcessManager
public interface IAeProcessManager
extends IAeManager

Defines the interface for process managers.

Method Detail

createBusinessProcess

public IAeBusinessProcess createBusinessProcess(IAeProcessPlan aProcessPlan)
                                         throws AeBusinessProcessException
Creates a business process from the process plan.

Returns:
the process instance
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

getProcess

public IAeBusinessProcess getProcess(long aProcessId)
                              throws AeBusinessProcessException
Returns the business process with the specified process id, locking the process into memory. Each call to getProcess(long) must be followed eventually by a matching call to releaseProcess(IAeBusinessProcess).

Parameters:
aProcessId -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException - if there is an error restoring the process or acquiring its lock, no need to call releaseProcess in this case

getProcessNoUpdate

public IAeBusinessProcess getProcessNoUpdate(long aProcessId)
                                      throws AeBusinessProcessException
Returns the business process with the specified process id, locking the process into memory. Each call to getProcessNoUpdate(long) must be followed eventually by a matching call to releaseProcess(IAeBusinessProcess). Calling getProcessNoUpdate(long) instead of getProcess(long) asserts that the caller will not modify the process, so that the process manager may discard the process from memory after it is released without updating its persistent representation (if there is one).

Parameters:
aProcessId -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

getProcessInstanceDetails

public AeProcessInstanceDetail getProcessInstanceDetails(long aProcessId)
Returns the process instance details for the process with the specified process id.

Parameters:
aProcessId -
Returns:
AeProcessInstanceDetail

getProcesses

public AeProcessListResult getProcesses(AeProcessFilter aFilter)
                                 throws AeBusinessProcessException
Returns a result set of processes based upon filter specification.

Parameters:
aFilter - the filter specification used to limit processes returned, may be null.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

journalEntryDone

public void journalEntryDone(long aProcessId,
                             long aJournalId)
Indicates that the engine has processed the given journal entry, so the process manager should delete the journal entry from storage when the process is next persisted.

Parameters:
aProcessId -
aJournalId - The id of the journal entry to delete.

journalInboundReceive

public long journalInboundReceive(long aProcessId,
                                  int aLocationId,
                                  AeInboundReceive aInboundReceive)
                           throws AeBusinessProcessException
Creates journal entry to recover inbound receive in the event of engine failure.

Parameters:
aProcessId -
aLocationId - The location id of the BPEL object that received the message.
aInboundReceive - The received message.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

                               long aTransmissionId)

aTransmissionId - The id of the transmission to delete.
